org.actus.events

Class EventFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.actus.events.EventFactory

  • public final class EventFactory
extends Object
    Factory of ContractEvents from a schedule of times

    The EventFactory allows to convert plain schedule times to ContractEvents.

    The times provided are expected to be plain schedule-times, i.e. the output of ScheduleFactory, and thus unadjusted for the business day convention.

    The class is a utility class with only static methods and no constructor, i.e. instances of this class cannot be created but its methods only be accessed in a static way.
